price: Say, “O People of the Book, why do you reject the verses of Allah when Allah is Witness to all what you do?”
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wal-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā taʿmalūna
